qa.name: Tommy
qa.appearance: Small for his age, with glasses

hf.name: Whisper
hf.appearance: Only visible to Tommy, shimmering outline

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the greatest friends are the ones only you can see.
json_to_edit.description: Tommy, a bullied child, finds solace and protection in his invisible friend, Whisper.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, distant laughter, gentle breeze
json_to_edit.name: Invisible Guardian
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Tommy's invisible friend, Whisper, helps him overcome bullying and gain confidence.

qa.action: Tommy sits alone on a bench in the bustling playground, looking dejected.

hf.action: Whisper appears next to Tommy, visible only to him, offering comfort.

tr.action: Tommy's face lights up as Whisper whispers encouragement in his ear.

xc.action: A group of bullies approaches Tommy, looking menacing.

ka.action: As the bullies reach for Tommy, Whisper invisibly intervenes, causing them to trip and stumble.

fn.action: Tommy's eyes widen in amazement as he realizes what Whisper has done.

af.action: Emboldened, Tommy stands up and confidently walks towards a group of friendly-looking kids.

qo.sfx_keywords: children's welcoming voices, Tommy's shy hello
qo.action: The group welcomes Tommy, inviting him to play with them.

fp.action: Tommy smiles brightly, glancing at Whisper who gives him a proud, shimmering thumbs-up.

edit_command: Expand the scene by adding three new shots that show Tommy's growing confidence throughout the day, with Whisper's subtle influence.

updated_json.voice_over: Sometimes, the greatest friends are the ones only you can see.
updated_json.description: Tommy, a bullied child, finds solace and protection in his invisible friend, Whisper.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, distant laughter, gentle breeze
updated_json.name: Invisible Guardian
updated_json.scene_summary: Tommy's invisible friend, Whisper, helps him overcome bullying and gain confidence.

qa.action: Tommy sits alone on a bench in the bustling playground, looking dejected.

hf.action: Whisper appears next to Tommy, visible only to him, offering comfort.

tr.action: Tommy's face lights up as Whisper whispers encouragement in his ear.

xc.action: A group of bullies approaches Tommy, looking menacing.

ka.action: As the bullies reach for Tommy, Whisper invisibly intervenes, causing them to trip and stumble.

fn.action: Tommy's eyes widen in amazement as he realizes what Whisper has done.

af.action: Emboldened, Tommy stands up and confidently walks towards a group of friendly-looking kids.

yz.action: In class, Tommy raises his hand to answer a question, with Whisper's encouraging shimmer beside him.

qo.sfx_keywords: children's welcoming voices, Tommy's shy hello
qo.action: The group welcomes Tommy, inviting him to play with them.

wx.action: At lunch, Tommy confidently sits with his new friends, Whisper's presence subtly felt nearby.

fp.action: Tommy smiles brightly, glancing at Whisper who gives him a proud, shimmering thumbs-up.

uv.action: As school ends, Tommy walks out with his new friends, standing taller and more confident, while Whisper follows invisibly.

label.rationale: we can expand the scene by adding three new shots that showcase tommy's growing confidence throughout the day, with whisper's subtle influence. these new shots will be inserted at appropriate points in the existing sequence to show a progression of tommy's character development. we'll update the number_of_shots from 9 to 12 and add three new entries to the shots dictionary. the list_display_order will also be updated to include these new shots.

value.action: In class, Tommy raises his hand to answer a question, with Whisper's encouraging shimmer beside him.
At lunch, Tommy confidently sits with his new friends, Whisper's presence subtly felt nearby.
As school ends, Tommy walks out with his new friends, standing taller and more confident, while Whisper follows invisibly.
